metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11281 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Pivotal RabbitMQ, versions prior to v3.7.18, and RabbitMQ for PCF, versions1.15.x prior to 1.15.13, versions 1.16.x prior to 1.16.6, and versions1.17.x prior to 1.17.3, contain two components, the virtual host limitspage, and the federation management UI, which do not properly sanitize userinput. A remote authenticated malicious user with administrative accesscould craft a cross site scripting attack that would gain access to virtualhosts and policy management information.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
